title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-9.21 - Inspector's test gage connection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-9.21 - Inspector's test gage connection

State Regulations

Each boiler shall be provided with a one-quarter inch
pipe size valved connection for the exclusive purpose of attaching a test gage
when the boiler is in service, so that the accuracy of the boiler steam gage
can be ascertained. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
14-9.21

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
